name: White leather LC4 chaise longue by Le Corbusier for Cassina, 1960s

condition.details: Wear consistent with age and use.

specifications.rawSpecificationsHTML: Chaise-longue with black structure, steel cross bar. The mattress pad is in white leather. The polyester padded headrest is in black leather. This model was first created in 1928 for the Villa Church in Ville-d’Avray. The chair remains in very good condition. It comes with the original paperwork. Please contact us for the best shipping options and price. We will discuss and figure out the best possible shipment method (and rate) for every individual object. Please watch the video for a more accurate representation of the colors and details, as it sometimes offers a clearer view than the photos.

The chair remains in very good condition. It comes with the original paperwork.
